column4: haha, ok jerbear. real 'observationalist' of you. what an ignorant statement
I have worked in production many times. i am well aware of the ramifications of high throughput of product to meet a demand.
again, not relevant to this discussion.
production is production, not matter the product.

well, after working many different types of production lines, including industrial fryolators, business cards, restaurants, etc. there are plenty of common denominators. i don't need to ask you what your credentials are, because they are irrelevant to this discussion.
jerbear and whoever else it may concern. can you continue this one in another chatroom?
well, this has been quite fun, but i see that the internet chats haven't changed much. *ducks from the flying ego's*
i don't read blogs, i read articles.
So, does anyone have a positive review or opinion of the new Gutsy?
